alert.note: Alert for Southeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, South Lincoln County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 1:51PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Elbert and west central Lincoln Counties through 230 PM MDT... At 151 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Kutch, or 26 miles south of Limon, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kutch and Punkin Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Southeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, South Lincoln County
